name: Isiwi
0:
”Alexa, show the camera”
”Alexa, hide the doorbell”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Isiwi is a leading developer for safer, easier & smarter home security solutions, we have upgraded our latest models to work with Alexa.
With Isiwi skill & Alexa, you can lie on your sofa and watch live streaming videos from Isiwi cameras on Amazon Alexa devices, for example, Echo Show, and Echo Spot...

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Isiwi App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Isiwi App, keep it online and running.
2. Find Isiwi Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
